ComicInfo.Summary:
Verdict from the Grave: Val must discover who killed a vacation resort's manager.
To Die of Laughter: A court jester uses a love potion on the king's daughter.
And in This Corner: Death!: After getting a tip that the big boxing match is rigged, Matt Loy borrows money from a loan shark to put on the fight.
The Locked Room!: Dr. Coates tries to prove evolution by creating a machine that regresses a vagrant to an ancient form.
Murder Can Be Fatal: Rafe kills the Barlows to steal their house, then their ghosts return to haunt him.
ComicInfo.Title: Verdict from the Grave; To Die of Laughter; And in This Corner: Death!; The Locked Room!; Murder Can Be Fatal
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
